bugs.title: CVE-2021-42612 halibut: use-after-free in cleanup_index() in index.c

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2021-42612 halibut: use-after-free in cleanup_index() in index.c

long_desc.thetext:
A use after free in cleanup_index in index.c in Halibut 1.2 allows an attacker to cause a segmentation fault or possibly have other unspecified impact via a crafted text document.

Reference:
https://carteryagemann.com/halibut-case-study.html#poc-halibut-text-uaf

Created halibut tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: epel-all [bug 2092897]
Affects: fedora-all [bug 2092898]

This CVE Bugzilla entry is for community support informational purposes only as it does not affect a package in a commercially supported Red Hat product. Refer to the dependent bugs for status of those individual community products.

bugs.title: CVE-2021-42613 halibut: double free in cleanup_index() in index.c

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2021-42613 halibut: double free in cleanup_index() in index.c

long_desc.thetext:
A double free in cleanup_index in index.c in Halibut 1.2 allows an attacker to cause a denial of service or possibly have other unspecified impact via a crafted text document.

Reference:
https://carteryagemann.com/halibut-case-study.html#poc-halibut-winhelp-df

bugs.title: CVE-2021-42614 halibut: use-after-free in info_width_internal() in bk_info.c

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2021-42614 halibut: use-after-free in info_width_internal() in bk_info.c

long_desc.thetext:
A use after free in info_width_internal in bk_info.c in Halibut 1.2 allows an attacker to cause a segmentation fault or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted text document.

Reference:
https://carteryagemann.com/halibut-case-study.html#poc-halibut-info-uaf

Created halibut tracking bugs for this issue:
